author: joshf
title: Catalyst Treasury Management
description: Funded proposals require a treasury and portfolio management tool beyond spreadsheets in order to track inflows and outflows.
solution: A simple, easy-to-use dashboard for funded proposals to track monthly disbursements from Catalyst, as well as expenses and wallet balances.
experience: F6 funded proposer. Wada network of 15+ funded proposals. 3+ years in financial services: Banking, Payments and Lending.
